name: Merlin War
description:
Merlin War

☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;:★:;;:☆:;;:★:;;: ☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;;:★

It's up to you to help Merlin fight the demons.

☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;:★:;;:☆:;;:★:;;: ☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;;:★:;;:☆:;;:★

Gameplay The merlin coins on the left are the price required to use your card. You can save it by burning the card or making the round pass.
The number written on your character or enemy character shows your health. 
Required cost from the numbers on the cards in the upper left, damage to the upper right, or improvement according to the characteristics of the card.
